text: [Music]
greetings my name is Matt Wood and I'm
here at the AWS headquarters in Seattle
to announce the general availability of
Amazon Lex Amazon Lex is a new service
for building conversational interfaces
into any application using Voice and
text with Amazon Lex the same deep
learning technologies that power Amazon
Alexa are now available to any developer
enabling you to quickly and easily build
sophisticated natural language
conversational Bots commonly referred to
as chat Bots no deep learning experience
is required to immediately start
creating chat Bots Lex chat Bots can be
built to understand Voice and text so
you can use them in your applications to
ask questions get answers or complete
sophisticated tasks and you can build
and test your Bots directly in the AWS
Management
console Lex enables you to easily
publish your voice or text chat Bots to
mobile devices web apps and services
such as Facebook messenger slack and
tweo Amazon Lex is a fully managed
service so as your user engagement
increases you don't need to worry about
provisioning Hardware or managing
infrastructure to power your Bot
experience Amazon Lex integrates with
AWS Lambda and you can use the
Enterprise connectors that have been
pre-built using Lambda functions to
fetch data from Enterprise systems like
Salesforce Microsoft Dynamics maretto
zenes QuickBooks or
HubSpot Amazon Lexus pay as you go price
ing makes it a costeffective way to
build conversational interfaces anywhere
you can try Amazon Lex for free today
thanks a
[Music]
lot
